## 4.25

```{r}
n <- 5 # 10
sample <- 5
times <- 1000
min <- matrix(nrow = times, ncol = n)
set.seed(1)

for (time in 1:times){
  U <- matrix(nrow = n, ncol = sample)
  for (i in 1:n){
    U[i, ] <- runif(sample, 0, 1)
    min[time, i] <- sort(U[i, ], partial = i)[i]
  }
}

round(apply(min, MARGIN = 2, FUN = median), 4)

check <- rep(NA, n)
for (i in 1:n){
  check[i] <- (i-1/3)/(n+1/3)
}
check

```


```{r}
n <- 5
```
